Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.name: debug
Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.abstract: All debug, info and errors will be shown.

Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.name: info
Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.abstract: All info and errors will be shown.

Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.name: error
Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.abstract: Only errors will be printed at this level.

Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.name: none
Classes/Logger/Level.html#/s:16MapirLive.abstract: No logs will be shown at this level.

Classes/AccountManager/APIKeyStatus.html.name: notAvailable
Classes/AccountManager/APIKeyStatus.html.abstract: API Key is not available. Possibly it is nil.

Classes/NetworkConfiguration.html#/c:@M@.name: usesSSL
Classes/NetworkConfiguration.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Indicates that the configuration uses SSL or not.

Classes/NetworkConfiguration.html.name: NetworkConfiguration
Classes/NetworkConfiguration.html.abstract: An object that represents a network configuration for the service.

Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: subscriber(_:locationReceived:)
Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Receives location updates of the specified tracking identifier.

Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: subscriber(_:stoppedWithError:)
Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Tells the delegate that the operation is going to stop with or without an error.

Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: subscriber(_:failedWithError:)
Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Sends the delegate errors related to failure of the procedure.

Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.name: initiated
Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.abstract: Class is initiated and it’s ready to start.

Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.name: starting
Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.abstract: Trying to connect Map.ir servers and receive credentials.

Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.name: running
Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.abstract: Service is runnging and data is being published successfully.

Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.name: stopped
Classes/Subscriber/Status.html#/s:16Mapi.abstract: Service is stopped due to user initiated stop of error occurance.

Classes/Subscriber.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveT.name: trackingIdentifier
Classes/Subscriber.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveT.abstract: Current tracking identifier which service is using.

Classes/Subscriber.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveT.name: status
Classes/Subscriber.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveT.abstract: Indicates the current status of the service.

Classes/Subscriber.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveT.name: start(withTrackingIdentifier:)
Classes/Subscriber.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveT.abstract: Starts receiving location of the the specified tracking identifier.

Classes/Subscriber.html.name: Subscriber
Classes/Subscriber.html.abstract: An object that handles fetching location lively based on a tracking identifier.

Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html.name: SubscriberDelegate
Protocols/SubscriberDelegate.html.abstract: An object that handles publishing user location lively.

Protocols/PublisherDelegate.html#/c:@M@M.name: publisher(_:stoppedWithError:)
Protocols/PublisherDelegate.html#/c:@M@M.abstract: Tells the delegate that the operation is going to stop with or without an error.

Protocols/PublisherDelegate.html#/c:@M@M.name: publisher(_:publishedLocation:)
Protocols/PublisherDelegate.html#/c:@M@M.abstract: Sends the delegate the latest published CLLocation object.

Protocols/PublisherDelegate.html#/c:@M@M.name: publisher(_:failedWithError:)
Protocols/PublisherDelegate.html#/c:@M@M.abstract: Sends the failure details to the delegate.

Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.name: initiated
Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.abstract: Class is initiated and it’s ready to start.

Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.name: starting
Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.abstract: Trying to connect Map.ir servers and receive credentials.

Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.name: running
Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.abstract: Service is runnging and data is being published successfully.

Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.name: stopped
Classes/Publisher/Status.html#/s:16Mapir.abstract: Service is stopped due to user initiated stop of error occurance.

Classes/Publisher.html#/s:16MapirLiveTra.name: trackingIdentifier
Classes/Publisher.html#/s:16MapirLiveTra.abstract: Current tracking identifier which service is using.

Classes/Publisher.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveTr.name: status
Classes/Publisher.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveTr.abstract: Indicates the current status of the service.

Classes/Publisher.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveTr.name: start(withTrackingIdentifier:)
Classes/Publisher.html#/c:@M@MapirLiveTr.abstract: Starts publishing location of the current device.

Classes/Publisher.html.name: Publisher
Classes/Publisher.html.abstract: An object that handles publishing user location lively based on a tracking identifier.
